Line 7: Line 7:
== Platform ==
== Platform ==
  +
The main objectives of the association is to work towards a political system based on genuine democracy and social justice. The first step on this road is to ensure basic guarantees of free and fair elections involving all the Egyptians so that there is an equal opportunity for all the Egyptians to run and win any elections, whether legislative elections or the presidential election. The National Association for Change platform is:
â
{{Expand-section|date=April 2010}}
+
# Ending the [[state of emergency]]<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=206650 National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people]</ref>.
  +
# Complete judicial oversight of the whole election process<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
  +
# Allowing local and international civil society groups to monitor elections<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
  +
# Equal access to media for all candidates, particularly during presidential elections<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
  +
# Giving Egyptians living abroad the right to vote at Egyptian embassies and consulates<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
  +
# The right to run for president without arbitrary restrictions in accordance with Egyptâs obligations under the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights as well as limiting the presidentâs service to two terms<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
  +
# Voting by the National ID. Achieving some of those procedures and guarantees necessitates the amendment of articles 76, 77, and 88 of the constitution as soon as possible<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people"/>.
